programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi and Rollins work together on an important arraignment; Benson tries to make Noah's Christmas wish come true when a case falls in her lap.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Benson becomes the target of a ruthless gang leader, Capt. Duarte takes the case; Fin works with the Bronx SVU to help clear its case backlog; Lt. Dixon offers to translate when a deaf student is raped.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: While Benson tries to help the gang member who attacked her, Duarte reveals a shocking piece of evidence in the case; Fin is tasked with hiring new detectives for the Bronx SVU.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As Benson and Carisi put a vengeful crime boss on trial, Fin tries to help a woman who was drugged and left for dead; Velasco takes drastic action to get information from a witness.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A car accident leads the detectives on a search for an ambulance driver assaulting his charges; Fin gives Detective Bruno a tour of Manhattan SVU.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The search for the sexual abuser of a child leads the detectives to a wealthy toy mogul known for his generous hospitality toward children.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman attempts to kidnap a child she believes is her daughter; while DNA tests are in progress, Benson traces the confusion about the child's origins back to a fertility doctor.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives investigate when a baby is left abandoned with a note indicating the mother's kidnapping and quickly learn that she has been kidnapped by a copycat serial killer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A professor (Billy Campbell) accused of sexual assault volunteers to submit a DNA sample for testing, but the case turns into a he-said, she-said standoff.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Fin investigate the brutal rape and murder of a prostitute, and the prime suspects turn out to be a group of teens suspected of re-enacting a favorite video game.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man has no recollection of events after stabbing his wife and holding her head underwater in a swimming pool.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: As the team investigates a convenience store robbery, the evidence leads them to an unusual pair of suspects, revealing a dark personal drama and another potential victim; Burgess slowly makes strides tackling her past trauma.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Atwater's worlds collide when a shooting at the building he owns in Burnside leaves a child dead; Atwater must confront his relationship with his father, Lew, as the brutal case forces them together.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Upton is unwittingly drawn into a deadly betrayal and finds herself in a fight for her life; with minimal leads, Voight and the team scramble to find her before it's too late.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Torres finds himself in the midst of a murder case that hits close to home and threatens to expose his troubled past; as he struggles to reconcile his old life with his new one, Voight keeps a watchful eye.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: As Richard Beck's timeline for a deadly attack moves up and Samantha panics, Ruzek and the team scramble to get ahead of unprecedented disaster.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Tasked with shadowing a crisis prevention team, Upton finds her approach to policing at odds with the team's mental health clinician; Voight stands by Upton as she continues to struggle in her personal life.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Ruzek gets mixed up in a case after a late-night poker game is raided; afraid of becoming like his father, Ruzek struggles to stand down and allow Intelligence to carry out the investigation while he remains on leave.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Carver deals with the fallout of his arrest; Brett searches for closure with the baby she rescued; Capp weasels his way into the Firehouse 51 group chat.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Brett waits for life-changing news; Herrmann encounters a psychic with a grave warning on a call; Kidd finds a new lead on the Homeland Security case.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Mouch sets out to change his legacy and nickname; Ritter pushes Herrmann to see a doctor; Brett searches for the perfect wedding venue.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Julia spends a couple of days at 51; Boden's stepson, James, returns, desperate for Boden to help his mother; after a little girl starts a fire in her backyard, Kidd and her team decide to dig deeper.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: After their defibrillator malfunctions on a call, Brett and Violet search for answers; Herrmann tries to find the perfect home for his new recliner; a secret from Gibson's past comes to light.

programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen
programme.desc: Disgraced Secret Service agent Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack and works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers.

programme.title: London Has Fallen
programme.desc: In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.

programme.title: Kings Court
programme.desc: Celebrity Kings Tyson, Carlos and Thaddeus begin their quest for love with the first group of Queens.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A dead newborn leads detectives to a dermatologist, then a serial pedophile.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A video voyeur catches a sexual assault against a minor on tape, which changes the focus of the investigation as the detectives search for a pedophile.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives discover that a murdered teenage girl was a prostitute and had contracted HIV while working on a pornographic film, which leads them to her killer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A home invasion and kidnapping lead the SVU to a shocking discovery; Muncy tries to fit in with the squad.

programme.title: Live: 2025 Open Championship
programme.desc: The opening round of The 153rd Open gets underway at Royal Portrush Golf Club in Northern Ireland.

programme.title: London Has Fallen
programme.desc: In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.

programme.title: Angel Has Fallen
programme.desc: Wrongfully accused of trying to kill the president, framed Secret Service agent Mike Banning must evade the FBI and his own agency to uncover the truth and save the country from imminent danger.

programme.title: FIA TCR World Tour

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Race action from the Moto3 Grand Prix of Germany at the iconic Sachsenring. Can Jose Antonio Rueda extend his lead at the top of the riders' standings?

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Race action from the Moto2 Grand Prix of Germany at the iconic Sachsenring. Can Spaniard Manuel Gonzalez pick up his fifth win of the season?

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: MotoGP action from the 2025 Grand Prix of Germany Sprint Race at Sachsenring. Can Ducati's Marc Marquez claim yet another Sprint victory?

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Race action from the 2025 MotoGP Grand Prix of Germany at the iconic Sachsenring. Championship leader Marc Marquez is on the hunt for his ninth Germany GP win.

programme.title: MotoGP Chequered Flag
programme.desc: Post-race show featuring analysis, highlights and interviews with all the key riders following the 2025 Grand Prix of Germany at the iconic Sachsenring.

programme.title: Premier League Goals of the Season
programme.desc: A look back at the top goals from the 2003/04 season. Thierry Henry top-scored with 30 goals as Arsenal became the first side to finish a league campaign unbeaten in 115 years.

programme.title: Premier League Goals of the Season
programme.desc: A look back at the best goals from the 2004/05 season. Thierry Henry won the Golden Boot for the second season running, with Crystal Palace's Andy Johnson coming a close second.

programme.title: Premier League Goals of the Season
programme.desc: A look back at the best goals from the 2005/06 season. Thierry Henry became the first player in the league's history to win the Golden Boot four times, top-scoring with 27 goals.

programme.title: Premier League Goals of the Season
programme.desc: A look back at the best goals from the 2006/07 season. Chelsea's Didier Drogba topped the scoring charts with 20 goals, ahead of Benni McCarthy (18) and Cristiano Ronaldo (17).

programme.title: Premier League Goals of the Season
programme.desc: A look back at the best goals from the 2007/08 season. Cristiano Ronaldo topped the scoring charts with a remarkable 31 goals, ahead of Fernando Torres and Emmanuel Adebayor on 24.

programme.title: Premier League Goals of the Season
programme.desc: A look back at the best goals from the 2008/09 season. Chelsea striker Nicolas Anelka secured the Golden Boot with 19 goals, beating Cristiano Ronaldo to the prize.

programme.title: Sign Up: Into Football
programme.desc: Watch our favourite interviews and moments from last season, all featuring British Sign Language and subtitles. Guests include Arne Slot, Phil Foden, John McGinn and Eberechi Eze.

programme.desc: A look back at the best bowling action from the second Test between Sri Lanka and Bangladesh, as Asitha Fernando and Dhananjaya de Silva caused problems for the visitors.
